mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT ( MEM_CD, DF_CD, EP_TITLE, EP_VTYPE, EP_OTYPE, EP_SDATE, EP_EDATE, EP_DAYS, EP_PRICE, EP_LOCATION, EP_INPUT1, EP_INPUT2, EP_INPUT3, EP_REASON, EP_CONTENTS, EP_DSTATUS, EP_FDATE, EP_RDATE ) VALUES ( #{memCd}, #{dfCd}, #{epTitle}, #{epVType}, #{epOType}, #{epSDate}, #{epEDate}, #{epDays}, #{epPrice}, #{epLocation}, #{epInput1}, #{epInput2}, #{epInput3}, #{epReason}, #{epContents}, #{epDStatus}, #{epFDate}, NOW() ) ;
mapper.select: SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, A.CON_STEP AS CON_STEP, A.CON_PSTATUS AS CON_PSTATUS, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME, A.MEM_NAME AS CONMEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CONFIRM AS CON WHERE CON.CON_PSTATUS = 4 ) A ON EP.EP_CD = A.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD ORDER BY EP.EP_CD DESC

SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, A.CON_STEP AS CON_STEP, A.CON_PSTATUS AS CON_PSTATUS, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME, A.MEM_NAME AS CONMEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CONFIRM AS CON WHERE CON.CON_PSTATUS = 4 ) A ON EP.EP_CD = A.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD ORDER BY EP.EP_CD DESC

SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, CON.CON_STEP AS CON_STEP, CON.CON_PSTATUS AS CON_PSTATUS, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME, CON.MEM_NAME AS CONMEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN CONFIRM AS CON ON EP.EP_CD = CON.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD LEFT JOIN REFERENCE AS REF ON EP.EP_CD = REF.EP_CD WHERE
(EP.EP_DSTATUS = 2) AND (CON.CON_CD) IN ( SELECT CON_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM CONFIRM WHERE CON_PSTATUS = 2 AND CON_STEP = 4 ORDER BY EP_CD ) A GROUP BY A.EP_CD )

SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, A.CON_STEP AS CON_STEP, A.CON_PSTATUS AS CON_PSTATUS, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME, A.MEM_NAME AS CONMEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CONFIRM AS CON WHERE CON.CON_PSTATUS = 0 AND CON.CON_STEP = (SELECT MIN(SCON.CON_STEP) FROM CONFIRM AS SCON WHERE SCON.CON_PSTATUS =0 AND SCON.EP_CD = CON.EP_CD) ) A ON EP.EP_CD = A.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD WHERE A.MEM_CD = #{memCd}

SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, A.CON_STEP AS CON_STEP, A.CON_PSTATUS AS CON_PSTATUS, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME, A.MEM_NAME AS CONMEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CONFIRM AS CON WHERE CON.CON_PSTATUS = 2 ) A ON EP.EP_CD = A.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD WHERE A.MEM_CD = #{memCd} AND EP.EP_DSTATUS = 2

SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, A.CON_STEP AS CON_STEP, A.CON_PSTATUS AS CON_PSTATUS, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME, A.MEM_NAME AS CONMEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CONFIRM AS CON WHERE CON.CON_PSTATUS = 2 ) A ON EP.EP_CD = A.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD LEFT JOIN REFERENCE AS REF ON EP.EP_CD = REF.EP_CD WHERE REF.MEM_CD = #{memCd}

SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, A.CON_STEP AS CON_STEP, A.CON_PSTATUS AS CON_PSTATUS, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME, A.MEM_NAME AS CONMEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CONFIRM AS CON WHERE CON.CON_PSTATUS = 2 AND CON.CON_STEP = (SELECT MAX(SCON.CON_STEP) FROM CONFIRM AS SCON WHERE SCON.CON_PSTATUS =2 AND SCON.EP_CD = CON.EP_CD) ) A ON EP.EP_CD = A.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD WHERE EP.MEM_CD = #{memCd}

SELECT EP.EP_CD AS EP_CD, EP.EP_RDATE AS EP_RDATE, EP.EP_TITLE AS EP_TITLE, EP.EP_DSTATUS AS EP_DSTATUS, DF.DF_KIND AS DF_KIND, MEM.MEM_NAME AS MEM_NAME FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD WHERE EP.MEM_CD = #{memCd} AND EP_DSTATUS = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT SET EP_DSTATUS = #{epDStatus}, EP_FDATE = NOW() WHERE EP_CD=#{epCd}
mapper.select:
SELECT EP.*, DF.*, MEM.*, DEP.DEP_NAME, CON.*, REF.*
FROM ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT AS EP LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_FORM AS DF ON EP.DF_CD = DF.DF_CD LEFT JOIN CONFIRM AS CON ON EP.EP_CD = CON.EP_CD LEFT JOIN REFERENCE AS REF ON EP.EP_CD = REF.EP_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS MEM ON EP.MEM_CD = MEM.MEM_CD LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT AS DEP ON MEM.DEP_CD = DEP.DEP_CD WHERE EP.EP_CD=#{epCd}
